name: rumpled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
creased (= not smooth) and untidy: a rumpled suit/sheet/bed He hadn't brushed his hair and his clothes were rumpled. See
rumple
More examplesFewer examplesHer dress was rumpled and too tight.He is rumpled and disheveled most of the time.Betsy always had a rumpled look.
